snippet.title: Pixel P.I. Trailer - The Detective Game That Lets YOU Ask The Questions! 🔍💾
snippet.description:
Pixel P.I. is a detective game with the novelty of being able to process natural language to interact with text written by the player. One of the main features of the game consists of unlocking statements by asking natural language questions.

The protagonist of the game is Pixel, a hacker detective girl who lost her memories and is going through a list of old cases to hopefully find information about her recent past.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2448910/Pixel_PI/
Play the demo on itch: https://crischu.itch.io/pixel-pi
